name: Squirrel Hunter
description:
Play as a hawk via Leap Motion and capture as many squirrels as possible!

Change Log

v0.7

- Squirrels are animated and have models instead of cubes!

v0.8

- Nest for dropping squirrels
- Scoring system and effects
- Menu and instructions

v0.85

- Sound effects added

v0.9

- Terrain and trees added

v0.95

- Performance improvements
- Visual improvements

v1.0

- More visual improvements
- Final tweaks and polish
